title: BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work-Versatile Foot Stool with Washable Cover-Comfortable Footrest with 2 Adjustable Heights for Car,Home and Office to Relieve Back,Lumbar,Knee Pain-Black
descriptions:
Introducing the BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work! Say goodbye to discomfort and hello to ultimate relaxation with our versatile foot stool. Made from high-quality foam with a durable fabric cover in sleek black, this footrest is designed to provide maximum comfort and support.

Adjustable to two different heights using magic tapes and a zipper mechanism, this foot rest is perfect for use in the office, car, home, or even on an airplane. It not only relieves back, lumbar, and knee pain, but also promotes correct sitting habits and supports ergonomic design.

The non-slip bottom ensures stability, while the removable and machine washable cover makes cleaning a breeze. Treat yourself to the BlissTrends Foot Rest and experience the ultimate comfort wherever you go. Make every step a blissful one with our footrest!

Experience ultimate comfort and support with BlissTrends Foot Rest for Under Desk at Work. The adjustable height feature, using magic tapes and a zipper, allows you to customize your comfort level. The non-slip design ensures stability, perfect for use in the office, car, home, or even on an airplane. Easy to clean with a removable, machine-washable cover, this footrest promotes correct sitting habits and provides relief from discomfort. Say goodbye to pain and hello to blissful relaxation with BlissTrends Foot Rest!
